knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r libraries}
library(maps)
library(mapproj)
library(leaflet)
library(rgdal)
library(GISTools)
library(sp)
library(plyr)
```

```{r}
## Load county borders
uk_county_boundaries <- readOGR(dsn = "data/shapefiles/", layer = "infuse_uk_2011", verbose = F)
```

```{r}
map <- leaflet(data = uk_county_boundaries) %>% addTiles()
map %>% addPolygons(
  stroke = FALSE,
  smoothFactor = 0.2,
  fillOpacity = 0.8,
  # fillColor = ~ pal(var),
  weight = 1
)
```
